Mahindra Vaal welcomes trade-ins from all makes and models of vehicles. We offer on-site finance through all major banks, subject to qualifying criteria. All vehicles undergo Dekra AA Roadworthy test to ensure vehicle is mechanically sound. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted onto your finance. For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. Comes with a standard 6 year/150 000 km warranty until February 2028 and a 3 year/ 90 000 km.
Service plan valid until February 2025.

Purchase this new Nissan Micra 1.0T Acenta Plus(84kW) now! The turbocharged engine produces 84kW of power and 180Nm of torque. It is sporty yet elegant. It is also quite stylish with its sharp edges and design cues. It has a host of Nissan Intelligent Mobility features such as Around view monitoring which allows you to view your surroundings, moving object detection which allows you to see problems before they actually become problems, blind spot warning which warns you when there's a vehicle approaching your blind spots to prevent you from turning into that lane, Intelligent forward emergency braking warns you when you need to stop.  It is also quite fuel efficient with manufacturers' claimed figures averaging 5 litres per 100 km. 

Price excludes license registration, Administration, delivery, and on the road fees.

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.


Book your test drive today!
